Header: Speaker says country needs politics of gentlemen
Content: Speaker Karu Jayasuriya says that the country needs politics of gentlemen instead of politics for power. He was speaking during a function at Ambalangoda.Speaker Karu Jayasuriya said that the previous election was very peaceful. The time has come for a change in the country. He said that public should be able to speak the parliamentarians without any fear and suspicion.
